review: Factorio, or as I like to call it; 'the time machine' is a fun game that will make you  wish there was more time in the day... Days? Hang on... *checks play time* ... Buy this game. You won't regret it. 9/10.  Would defiantly be one of my all time favs.
Love this game so far! Seriously hoping the developers continue to improve this game.Highly reccomend this game.
One of the best Cartoon styled Fps games ive played! ***** five stars!
